title: Fools Walk In
description: Yes, fools walk in--even though the fool is a professor. But what could a poor teacher do when he met the blonde standing in the rain with a suitcase full of trouble?She was running for her life. The cops wanted her! A gang of thieves wanted her!The professor wanted her because she was the most beautiful girl he had ever seen. And it didn't matter what happened to him.
author: Bruno Fischer
